item.title: Java Inheritance
item.description: Java Basics Inheritance Access Modifiers protected Visible to child class private public Encapsulation Using API to communicate Class or members can be least accessed by external Child class rewrites the parent class Methods in child class must have higher access level Field can’t be public getter setter Abstract class and Interface Abstract class abstract keyword abstract method -> abstract class Can’t be instanced Can be inherited Interface public field static final Members(field and method) public Difference Abstract class provide a IS-A relationship while Interface provides a LIKE-A relationship One class can applied several interfaces but can’t inherit more than one abstract class Fields of interface must be static/final but abstract class has no restriction Members of interface must be public but abstract class have multiple accesses Choose Interface (higher priority) Irrelevant classes need to realize the same method need to use multiple inheritance Abstract class Relevant classes need to share same code block Need to control members’ access Need to inherit non-static or no-constant field Super Access parent classes’ constructor Access members of parent classes Method priority this.

item.title: Java Keywords
item.description: Java Basics Keywords final Data As for primitive data type, final make its value immutable As for reference, it can’t reference other objects but can modify itself Method Methods stated can’t be rewrite by its child class Class Can’t be inherited static Variable static variable (also called class variable) Belongs to the class and can be shared/accessed by the class name instance variable When creating an instance there will be an instance variable static method It exists when loading the class Don’t rely on any instance Can’t be abstract Can’t contain this, super keywords (they are related to specific object) static (initialization) block Operate once when doing the class initialization static inner class Don’t rely on external instance Can’t access non-static variables or methods of external class static import No need to refer to the ClassName Simplify Hard to read Initialization order static variable, static block (Parent class) static variable, static block (Child class) instance variable, block (Parent class) Constructor (Parent class) instance variable, block (Child class) Constructor (Child class)
